title: There Are Three Major Tailwinds for Crypto’s Next Rally, Says Galaxy Digital’s Alex Thorn
contentSnippet: The firm's top researcher says the structural bull case is intact, pointing to AI capex, stablecoins and tokenization as tailwinds even after this month’s shakeout.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Satoshi's Bitcoin stash declined by over $20B from all-time high amid crash
contentSnippet: The recent market crash that caused some cryptocurrencies to lose up to 99% of their value also dealt a significant hit to Satoshi's wallets.

title: Roman Storm asks DeFi devs: Can you be sure DOJ won't charge you?
contentSnippet: Current laws in the United States do not explicitly protect open source software developers and create the risk of retroactive prosecution.

title: Richest YouTube Star MrBeast’s Firm Files Trademark With Crypto Ambitions
contentSnippet: The application includes language related to crypto and Web3, such as managing financial services, downloadable software, and SaaS tools for managing crypto-related functionality.

title: Analyst Says He ‘Nibbled’ HYPE Below $34, Eyes $28 Area as Downtrend Persists
contentSnippet: In an X post, a respected pseudonymous crypto analyst said he bought a HYPE spot position under $34 and would "load up" closer to $28 amid a market downtrend.

title: Ripple CLO Rejects the Narrative That Crypto Is Just a Tool for 'Crime and Corruption'
contentSnippet: In an X post, Ripple's Stuart Alderoty said two recent New York Times pieces wrongly cast crypto as only a tool for crime and corruption.

title: Wikipedia Traffic Drops as AI Answers Eat the Free Encyclopedia
contentSnippet: The Wikimedia Foundation revealed an unsettling trend: search engines and chatbots are providing Wikipedia's content directly to users without sending them to the site.

title: Stablecoins are really 'central business digital currencies' — VC
contentSnippet: Jeremy Kranz, founder of Sentinel Global, a venture capital firm, said investors should be "discerning" and read the fine print on any stablecoin.

title: 'Great Hackers, Terrible Traders': How Exploiters Panic Sold and Lost $13M During Market Chaos
contentSnippet: Six hacker wallets dumped ETH during the Oct. 10 market crash, then rebought at higher prices, amplifying losses.

title: OpenSea Confirms Q1 Launch for SEA Token With Half of Supply Allocated to Community
contentSnippet: The token will be integrated into OpenSea, allowing users to stake behind favorite collections or projects, Finzer said.

title: 'Deploying More Capital — Steady Lads': Bitcoin Treasury Companies Struggle to Halt Plunge
contentSnippet: Already losing favor with investors when bitcoin was in bull mode, companies built around stacking BTC are facing an even larger threat thanks to the price collapse over the past two weeks.

title: BNB Outperforms Wide Market on Growing RWA Adoption, Potential Coinbase Listing
contentSnippet: The token's price action is driven partly by Coinbase considering BNB for a listing and China Merchants Bank International tokenizing a MMF on the BNB Chain.

title: Bitcoin-Holding Institutions Seeking Yield, DeFi Capabilities
contentSnippet: Projects such as Rootstock and Babylon may be perking institutional demand for Bitcoin-based yield and restaking

title: Ondo Finance Urges SEC to Delay Nasdaq's Tokenization Plan Over Transparency Gaps
contentSnippet: The proposed rule change relies on Nasdaq's vague understanding of how the Depository Trust Company (DTC) would handle post-trade settlement for these tokens.

title: Can Bitcoin recover as gold plunges from record highs? Analysts weigh in
contentSnippet: Bitcoin-to-gold ratio hits historic lows that previously preceded major bull runs, with past bottoms preceding 100–600% BTC price rallies.

title: Circuit Breakers in DeFi? Why Experts Say Managing Chaos On-Chain Isn't That Easy
contentSnippet: Crypto prices plummeted last week as liquidations fueled historic volatility. Experts say that Wall Street’s safety net wouldn’t have helped.

title: Crypto Biz: 'Sound money' meets a sound beating as Binance pledges bailout
contentSnippet: Crypto markets reel from a crash, Binance pledges relief, JP Morgan to offer crypto, and corporations are stacking BTC as Elon Musk praises it.

title: Bitcoin price ‘lines up nicely’ for $95K drop next despite bullish RSI data
contentSnippet: Bitcoin steadied into weekend trading, but BTC price targets still saw a dip below $100,000 despite increasingly bullish RSI signals.

title: What if quantum computers already broke Bitcoin?
contentSnippet: A quantum computer powerful enough to break Bitcoin could steal coins while the network runs as usual.

title: L1 is the new battleground, and the playing field isn’t even
contentSnippet: Corporate giants are building their own L1s, shifting blockchain from neutral infrastructure to strategic moats with regulatory advantages.

title: Robinhood tokenizes nearly 500 US stocks, ETFs on Arbitrum for EU users
contentSnippet: Robinhood’s tokenization drive on Arbitrum now includes nearly 500 US stock and ETF tokens worth over $8.5 million, as the brokerage deepens its RWA push.

title: 'Only $250K?' Jack Dorsey Prods Tether Over Donation to Support Bitcoin Devs
contentSnippet: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey previously gave $21 million to support OpenSats, which backs Bitcoin developers. Tether gave $250,000 to the nonprofit this week.

title: OneKeyが12万件のビットコイン秘密鍵脆弱性を報告、トラストウォレットに影響か
contentSnippet: ワンキーがリブビットコイン・エクスプローラー3.xの脆弱性により約12万件のビットコイン秘密鍵がクラッキング可能になると報告した。トラストウォレットなど複数の製品が影響を受けている模様。

title: オープンシーが2026年1QにSEAトークン発行予定、供給量の50%をコミュニティへ配布
contentSnippet: オープンシーCEOが2026年第1四半期のSEAトークン発行を発表した。総供給量の50%がコミュニティに配分され、収益の50%が買い戻しに使用される。ステーキング機能も実装予定だ。

title: G20、グローバルな仮想通貨規制の不足を指摘　ステーブルコインの課題も
contentSnippet: 国際的な金融監督機関FSBが、ビットコインなど仮想通貨の規制実施状況を評価する報告書を発表。各国規制の断片化と一貫性の欠如を指摘し、ステーブルコイン監督の課題も述べた。

title: 著名ユーチューバー「ミスタービースト」、仮想通貨取引所商標を申請
contentSnippet: 登録者4億4600万人のユーチューバー、ミスタービーストが仮想通貨取引やDEX運営を含む金融プラットフォームの商標を申請した。バンキングや投資サービスも提供する計画だ。

title: 決済大手ストライプ支援のL1チェーン「テンポ」、750億円を調達　イーサリアムOBが参画
contentSnippet: ストライプとパラダイムが支援する決済特化型L1ブロックチェーン「テンポ」が750億円を調達した。評価額は7,500億円に達し、著名イーサリアム開発者も参画する。

title: スイス当局、FIFAのNFTプラットフォームを違法賭博として刑事告発
contentSnippet: スイス賭博監督局がFIFAのブロックチェーン型NFTプラットフォームを違法な賭博サービスとして刑事告発した。参加に金銭的賭け金が必要で、賞金獲得が抽選で決まる仕組みが宝くじやスポーツベッティングに該当すると判断された。

title: オープンシーがNFT特化から事業転換、22チェーン対応の仮想通貨取引所に＝報道
contentSnippet: NFT市場の崩壊を経たオープンシーが、22ブロックチェーン対応のマルチチェーン仮想通貨取引アグリゲーターに転換すると報じられた。

title: アーサー・ヘイズのMaelstrom、仮想通貨企業の買収ファンドを計画　370億円超規模
contentSnippet: アーサー・ヘイズ氏は、仮想通貨企業をターゲットにした企業買収ファンドの構想があることを明かした。ファンドの規模は370億円超で、投資インフラや分析プラットフォームなどのサービスプロバイダーに特化する。

title: Huobi創設者が1500億円規模のイーサリアム保有企業設立へ、アジア投資家が参画
contentSnippet: 中国の仮想通貨取引所Huobi創設者リー・リン氏が、アジアの初期イーサリアム支援者らと10億ドル規模のデジタル資産信託を立ち上げる。ナスダック上場企業買収を交渉中で、2-3週間以内に発表予定だ。

title: 米地方銀行の不良債権増加で金が大幅続伸、2023年破綻危機の再来懸念か
contentSnippet: 米地方銀行が不良債権を償却し株価が急落する中、金価格は今週7.34%上昇した。JPモルガンCEOが更なる問題発生を警告し、投資家は2023年の銀行危機再来を懸念している。

title: Relax, That's Not a Stranger in Your House—It's Just an AI Prank
contentSnippet: A viral prank using AI-generated photos of a “homeless man” inside people’s homes has led to 911 calls, police warnings, and backlash over its cruelty.

title: Stripe's Tempo Blockchain Raises $500 Million, Poaches Prominent Ethereum Dev
contentSnippet: Dankrad Feist has left the Ethereum Foundation to help build Stripe's Tempo blockchain, which Fortune reports is now valued at $5 billion.

title: YouTube Star MrBeast Files Trademark for Crypto Exchange and Payments Service
contentSnippet: MrBeast trademarks crypto exchange app, but regulatory hurdles remain before the YouTube star can launch MrBeast Financial.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Bleed as Traders Weigh End of 4-Year Cycle
contentSnippet: Experts believe that some retail traders still follow the four-year Bitcoin cycle rulebook, accounting for part of crypto’s recent decline.

title: Why Wintermute and Other Market Makers Stopped Trading During Bitcoin Crash, $19B Liquidation
contentSnippet: Market makers paused trading during last week's flash crash, potentially adding to the volatility. Here’s what happened.

title: Here's When to Expect the SEA Token as OpenSea Trading Volume Spikes
contentSnippet: NFT marketplace and token trading platform OpenSea will launch its SEA token in Q1 2026, with 50% allocated for its community of users.

title: 9 Biggest Bitcoin Crashes in History
contentSnippet: Mt. Gox hacks, China bans, COVID panic, and the FTX implosion: Here’s a brief history of the biggest price crashes in Bitcoin history.
